name: TecOrb Technologies Pvt. Ltd.
description:
TecOrb Technologies helps you improve your company’s performance. We deliver real business results through the client-centric approach to technology and providing the right expertise according to your needs. We follow agile development methodology for achieving your satisfaction by developing software applications in our planned phases.
Our Skills 
We have a skilled team that has accomplished the task with fine working and had done wonders for us.Our employees had bought valuable real-world experience to our team.
We have gems at our place to take care of everything you would need for your startup to succeed.
We do have well expert having in application development/designing; are proficient in following domains:
Native: iOS, Android 
Web service: XML/JSON, REST/SOAP  
MIDI: Chat & Messaging Engine: quickblox, XMPP, Jabber, OpenFire, OpenTok on WebRTC, Ejabberd, Erlang   
Social Network: Facebook, Twitter, Linkedin, Instagram, Youtube, Pinterest, Google+  
Place Service: Google Map, Geolocation, GPS
Online Payment Gateway: Stripe, Braintree, Paypal etc
Program Languages: Objective-C/C++, Swift, Java, Rails, Ruby On Rails, PHP, HTML5, JavaScript, NodeJs, CSS, Angular (1&2)
Database: MySQL, Oracle, MongoDB, Postgres, etc
About Us
TecOrb is very fast growing company that is totally focused on mobile applications and web-based solutions on various domains. Over the years we have assembled a huge pool of highly skilled resources, enabled by cutting-edge tools and technologies.
